sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ScrumStoryPointDurationSync</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Update percent_complete in Story when its state changes</description>
        <name>ScrumStoryPointDurationSync</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ScrumStoryPointDurationSync = Class.create();

ScrumStoryPointDurationSync.prototype = {
    initialize: function(story) {
		this.story = story;
    },
	
	syncDurationWithPoints: function() {
		var duration = '0 00:00:00';
		var points = this.story.story_points;
		if ( JSUtil.nil(points) ) {
			points = 1;
		}
		var isCancelledState = new ScrumStatesUtil(this.story.getRecordClassName()).isCancelledState(this.story.getValue('state'));
		if (!isCancelledState) {
			duration = points + ' 00:00:00';
		}
		this.story.duration.setDisplayValue(duration);
	},

    type: 'ScrumStoryPointDurationSync'
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2014-08-05 01:04:44</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>80b4341a379221001a8326877e41f178</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ScrumStoryPointDurationSync</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Agile Development 2.0" source="com.snc.sdlc.agile.2.0">c2159f242fc10110d8a4d5f62799b627</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_80b4341a379221001a8326877e41f178</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-04-23 05:37:00</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>604</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
